typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		VendorID as integer,
		tpep_pickup_datetime as timestamp,
		tpep_dropoff_datetime as timestamp,
		passenger_count as integer,
		trip_distance as decimal(18,0),
		RatecodeID as integer,
		store_and_fwd_flag as string,
		PULocationID as string,
		DOLocationID as string,
		payment_type as integer,
		fare_amount as decimal(19,4),
		extra as decimal(19,4),
		mta_tax as decimal(19,4),
		tip_amount as decimal(19,4),
		tolls_amount as decimal(19,4),
		improvement_surcharge as decimal(19,4),
		total_amount as decimal(19,4),
		congestion_surcharge as decimal(19,4)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> YellowTaxiData
source(output(
		payment_type as integer,
		payment_type_name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> PaymentTypeData
YellowTaxiData aggregate(groupBy(payment_type),
	total_payment_amount = sum(total_amount)) ~> YellowTripAggregateData
